Hips
Monday, August 14th, 2017, 2:23:02 PM

I think most folks in the Plat Discord know by now that I've finally gotten my husband to give GS another try. This is an accomplishment since we've been together since 2006. He tried the game in 2010 and didn't like it, but things seem to be going better this time.

He's been streaming his noob adventures on and off for the past few days and has gotten a few donations from members of the GS community. To thank everyone for watching and enjoying his antics, he wants to use those donations to give away a 50-count Duskruin booklet to one lucky person that follows his stream.

All you have to do for a chance to win is follow his stream.

The giveaway itself will likely happen on Friday, before Duskruin opens. More details to follow!
